thread.title: Tavarres King's 1st TD came after the Packers got stuffed on 4th down against the Giants
thread.title_full: Tavarres King's 1st TD came after the Packers got stuffed on 4th down against the Giants

author: Harry Lyles Jr.
title: Tavarres King's 1st TD came after the Packers got stuffed on 4th down against the Giants
text:
It was a nice one, too.
The Green Bay Packers helped the New York Giants get back into the game on Sunday after a questionable fourth down call.
The Packers had the ball on their own 43-yard line, with a 4th and 1 situation. Mike McCarthy opted to go for it, and the Packers tried to hand it off to Ty Montgomery, who was stuffed at the line.
Two plays later, Eli Manning took a few steps to get his feet set, stepped into the throw, and hit Tavarres King in stride for an easy 41-yard touchdown pass.
That touchdown made it a 14-13 game, and gave the Giants momentum going back on defense. It was also Kingâ€™s first career touchdown pass, and there might not have been a better time for it to come.
